meanings.definition: An unfavorable or harmful effect or disadvantage.
meanings.sent1: The disbenefit of eating too much candy is getting cavities.
meanings.sent2: One disbenefit of staying up late is feeling tired the next day.
meanings.sent3: The disbenefit of having a pet dinosaur is cleaning up after it.
meanings.sent4: The disbenefit of procrastination is the stress of last-minute work.
meanings.sent5: The disbenefit of skipping breakfast is feeling hungry before lunch.

meanings.definition: To cause harm or disadvantage to.
meanings.sent1: Eating too much candy can disbenefit your teeth.
meanings.sent2: Not getting enough sleep can disbenefit your health.
meanings.sent3: Trying to juggle too many tasks may disbenefit your productivity.
meanings.sent4: Negative thoughts can disbenefit your mental well-being.
meanings.sent5: Skipping meals can disbenefit your energy levels.
